site.footer: Myoko / Nagano, Japan — Jan 2026 • Built fast, left imperfect on purpose.

phases.title: Land, Linkup & Transfer
phases.body: Touchdown in Tokyo! Crew linkup at the airport, grab some konbini snacks, then hop on our rentals for the scenic ride to Myoko. Evening arrival means we'll settle into our digs and get those rental boards sorted. Tomorrow we ride! 🏂

phases.title: Powder Paradise & Culture
phases.japanese: パウダーパラダイス・文化体験
phases.body: Five days of pure snowboarding bliss! Wake up to fresh powder, carve through pristine groomers, and hunt for those hidden tree runs. After epic sessions, we'll soak in traditional onsens, visit the historic Zenkoji Temple, and share stories over daily beers. This is what we came for - epic lines, deep powder, and unforgettable memories. The mountains are calling! 🗻❄️

phases.title: Tokyo Takeover
phases.body: Back to the big city! Free and easy exploration of Tokyo's endless wonders. From the neon-lit streets of Shibuya to the late-night izakaya parties, we're making the most of every moment. The city never sleeps, and neither do we! 🌃🍻

phases.title: Until Next Time
phases.body: All good things must come to an end... but the memories last forever. Pack up those epic stories and head back home. Until next time, the powder will be waiting! じゃあね、また会おう！ ✈️🏂

gear.title: Gear List & Advice
gear.intro: Essential equipment and tips for your snowboarding adventure.
items: Board & bindings: all‑mountain/freeride; check screws; cold‑temp wax.
Clothing: waterproof jacket/pants, mid‑layer fleece, thermal base.
Essentials: helmet, goggles (low‑light + sunny lens), gloves, sunscreen.
Nice‑to‑have: action cam, spare batteries, collapsible bottle, first‑aid.
